availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Noyes, Jr. (Morgan County, OH, farmer)

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Maine native. Married to Sybil Blake Noyes in Morgan County, Ohio, on March 31, 1834. Father of Joseph F. Noyes and Rilla Lucinda Noyes. Farmer in Morgan County in 1840. Juror in Morgan County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Olive Township, p. 150.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Meigsville, p. 142A.
"Joseph Noyes (1809-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial #11328947, accessed September 7, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11328947.
Ohio Death Certificates, 1911-1965,Ohio Bureau of Vital Statistics, Ohio Department of Health, Columbus, OH, File #44931.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Morgan County Marriages, 1819-1860, Film #000910657, p. 265.
KYR-0001-022-0008.
